# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
-  Ensure burner equipment is fueled before use
### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
-  Ensure inserter has source items before use
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients
-  Ensure furnace has ingredients before use
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected
-  Ensure steam engine is connected to the power grid before use
### Errors when using electricity group but not being plugged into electric network
-  Ensure electricity group is plugged into the electric network before use

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables defined by the agent were found in the execution logs.
